about_preview.title: About Sailing Billabong
about_preview.description: Our passion for sailing and love of the ocean drives us to create exceptional experiences for adventurers and families alike. With years of experience navigating these beautiful waters, we know the best spots for swimming, snorkeling, and simply enjoying the tranquility of life at sea.

tours_preview.title: Our Sailing Tours
tours_preview.description: From half-day adventures to week-long expeditions, we offer tours designed to match your schedule and adventure level.

tours.name: Family Discovery Tour
tours.description: Perfect for families with children, featuring calm waters and kid-friendly activities.

tours.name: Extended Expedition
tours.description: The ultimate sailing adventure covering remote islands and exclusive anchorages.
